verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> when he was in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> you are my <S%H410>God;<s%> <S%H7836>early<s%> will I <S%H7836>seek<s%> you: my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6770>thirsts<s%> for you, my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H3642>longs<s%> for you in a <S%H6723>dry<s%> and thirsty <S%H776>land,<s%> where <S%H1097>no<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> is;
To <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H5797>power<s%> and your <S%H3519>glory,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> as I have <S%H2372>seen<s%> you in the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H2416>life,<s%> my <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall <S%H7623>praise<s%> you.
<S%H3651>Thus<s%> will I <S%H1288>bless<s%> you while I <S%H2416>live:<s%> I will <S%H5375>lift<s%> up my <S%H3709>hands<s%> in your <S%H8034>name.<s%>

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> as with <S%H2459>marrow<s%> and <S%H1880>fatness;<s%> and my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall <S%H1984>praise<s%> you with <S%H7445>joyful<s%> <S%H8193>lips:<s%>
<S%H518>When<s%> I <S%H2142>remember<s%> you on my <S%H3326>bed,<s%> and <S%H1897>meditate<s%> on you in the night <S%H821>watches.<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> you have <S%H1961>been<s%> my <S%H5833>help,<s%> therefore in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of your <S%H3671>wings<s%> will I <S%H7442>rejoice.<s%>
But those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> to <S%H7722>destroy<s%> it, shall <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H8482>lower<s%> parts of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
They shall <S%H5064>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> they shall be a <S%H4521>portion<s%> for <S%H7776>foxes.<s%>

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H7650>swears<s%> by him shall <S%H1984>glory:<s%> but the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of them that <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> shall be <S%H5534>stopped.<s%>
